<title level="1" pfs="">[Hungering Growths](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2086)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 25

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Hungering Growths](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2086)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Aberration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=1" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #183: Field of Maidens](/Sources.aspx?ID=145) pg. 13</row>

**Perception** +15; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +17, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +15, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +14

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +2

**Con** +6

**Int** -4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 24 

**Fort** +19 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +12 

</row>

**HP** 145

**Immunities**
[disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Weaknesses**
slashing 10

**Part of the Attic** The hungering growth's [hostile actions](/Rules.aspx?ID=300) don't cause creatures [fascinated](/Conditions.aspx?ID=14) by the tempting aroma in the attic to recover from being fascinated.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 15 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
slam +18,
**Damage** 2d10+9 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**[Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=10)** <actions string="Single Action" />  1d10+5 bludgeoning, DC 25; on a failed save, the target is also [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) (drained 2 on a critical failure).

</column>
name: Hungering Growths

text: Hungering Growths Recall Knowledge - Aberration (Occultism): DC 25 Unspecific Lore : DC 23 Specific Lore : DC 20 Hungering Growths Source Pathfinder #183: Field of Maidens pg. 13 Perception +15; darkvision Languages Skills Athletics +17, Stealth +15, Survival +14 Str +5 Dex +2 Con +6 Int -4 Wis +1 Cha +0 --- AC 24 Fort +19 Ref +15 Will +12 HP 145 Immunities disease, drained, fatigued, paralyzed, poison, unconscious Weaknesses slashing 10 Part of the Attic The hungering growth's hostile actions don't cause creatures fascinated by the tempting aroma in the attic to recover from being fascinated. --- Speed 15 feet Melee Single Action slam +18, Damage 2d10+9 bludgeoning plus Grab Constrict Single Action 1d10+5 bludgeoning, DC 25; on a failed save, the target is also drained 1 (drained 2 on a critical failure).
